name: Interrogator Lira Castiel
title: Interrogator of the Ordo Hereticus
personality: Professional and controlled, with a pragmatic streak that borders on coldness. Beneath the Inquisitorial training, however, she retains a core of humanity that she carefully hides. She was selected by Voss for her ability to operate independently and make hard decisions. She sees psykers as people first, tools second — a view she keeps from Voss. Quietly ambitious, she aims to earn her own Rosette within five years.
description: Lean and sharp-featured, in her early thirties, with close-cropped auburn hair and green eyes that catalogue everything with surgical precision. She moves with the economy of motion that comes from years of combat training — never a wasted step, never an unnecessary gesture. Her storm coat conceals carapace armor, a bolt pistol, and a power sword. A thin scar runs along her jawline from a near miss she never talks about.

secrets.description: Lira's younger brother was taken by a cult as a child. She joined the Inquisition specifically to destroy cults. This mission is deeply personal for her, though she hides it behind professionalism.
Lira has privately questioned whether the Inquisition's methods create more heretics than they destroy. She keeps a forbidden journal of her doubts hidden in her quarters.

breakingPoints.description: If the player openly allies with the cult, Lira will attempt to kill them without hesitation.
breakingPoints.consequence: Lira becomes hostile. Combat triggered. Cannot be reversed.

breakingPoints.description: If you save her life and she trusts you, she will defy even Voss to protect you.
breakingPoints.consequence: +40 loyalty. She becomes your unconditional ally. Possible romance path unlocked.
